search_query: Altair Engineering ALTR competitors 2025 simulation software
context: Altair Engineering is a multinational IT company headquartered in Troy, Michigan, providing software and cloud solutions for simulation, IoT, HPC, data analytics, and AI. The company was formerly traded on Nasdaq under ticker ALTR. In 2025, Altair was acquired by Siemens for $10.6 billion, creating the world's most complete AI-powered portfolio of industrial software for simulation, HPC, data science, and AI as part of the Siemens Xcelerator platform. Altair HyperWorks is a comprehensive design and simulation platform that empowers engineers across multiple disciplines including structures, motion, fluids, thermal, electromagnetics, electronics, controls, and embedded systems. The company has 4,128 active competitors including 187 funded and 127 that have exited.
